body_html: The flow should be draft -> applied -> signed_off. The application drafts we're after are all in the applied state and an Application record has already been created for them (to freeze and protect them from modification).
body_text: The flow should be draft -> applied -> signed_off. The application drafts we're after are all in the applied state and an Application record has already been created for them (to freeze and protect them from modification).
body: The flow should be `draft -> applied -> signed_off`. The application drafts we're after are all in the `applied` state and an `Application` record has already been created for them (to freeze and protect them from modification).
